* <div> - general block level element (can contain other block or inline elements)
* <span> - inline element (can contain other inline elements)
* <header> - header for some content (there can be multiple headers in a page)
* <nav> - a section used for navigation
* <aside> - some separate content
* <img> - often used with [[HTML Attributes|src and alt attributes]] to describe an image
* <a> - an anchor element usually used with the [[HTML Attributes|href attribute]]
* <section> - should be able to be understood on its own
* <ol> - a list that has a certain ordering 
* <ul> - makes sense in any order
